titleStmt.title: Caledonia. The declaration of the council constituted by the Indian and African Company of Scotland; for the government and direction of their colonies, and settlements in the Indies.
titleStmt.author: Company of Scotland Trading to Africa and the Indies.
Ross, Hugh.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Sanders, one of His Majesties printers,

notesStmt.note: Signed: By order of the Council, Hugh Ross Secretary.
Imperfect: tightly bound; torn with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

person.persName: Robert Sanders, one of His Majesties printers
